WITH CHANGE_VSL_INFO AS ( SELECT VSL_CALL_ID, ORG_REF_NO, SUM(CG_WGT) WGT, SUM(CG_VOL) MSRMT, SUM (PKG_QTY) PKGQTY FROM TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE RHDL_MODE = 'C' GROUP BY VSL_CALL_ID, ORG_REF_NO ),
WH_BALANCE AS (SELECT I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD, I.WH_LOC_TP, SUM (I.CG_WGT) WGT, SUM (I.CG_VOL) MSRMT, SUM (I.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY FROM TMT_INV_LOC I WHERE I.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND I.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND I.WH_TP_CD = #{whTpCd} GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD, I.WH_LOC_TP HAVING SUM (I.CG_WGT) != 0 OR SUM (I.CG_VOL) != 0 OR SUM (I.PKG_QTY) != 0), IN_JOB_INFO AS ( SELECT I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD, I.WH_LOC_TP, SUM(I.CG_WGT) WGT, SUM(I.CG_VOL) MSRMT, SUM(I.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY FROM TMT_INV_LOC I INNER JOIN TMT_JOB J ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = I.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = I.CG_NO AND J.JOB_NO = I.JOB_NO WHERE I.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND I.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND I.WH_TP_CD = #{whTpCd} AND (J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('AW', 'GW') OR (J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WW') AND J.JOB_TP_CD = 'MV') OR (J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WW') AND J.JOB_TP_CD = 'RC')) GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD, I.WH_LOC_TP ),
OUT_JOB_INFO AS ( SELECT I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD, SUM (I.CG_WGT) WGT, SUM (I.CG_VOL) MSRMT, SUM (I.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY FROM TMT_INV_LOC I INNER JOIN TMT_JOB J ON J.VSL_CALL_ID = I.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = I.CG_NO AND J.JOB_NO = I.JOB_NO WHERE I.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND I.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND I.WH_TP_CD = #{whTpCd} AND J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('WG', 'WA') GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD ),
RHDL_JOB_INFO AS ( SELECT I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD, SUM(J.CG_WGT) AS WGT, SUM (J.CG_VOL) MSRMT, SUM (J.PKG_QTY) PKGQTY
FROM TMT_RHDL_CG R INNER JOIN TMT_JOB J ON R.RHDL_NO = J.RHDL_NO INNER JOIN TMT_INV_LOC I ON J.JOB_NO = I.JOB_NO AND J.VSL_CALL_ID = I.VSL_CALL_ID AND J.CG_NO = I.CG_NO
WHERE J.JOB_PURP_CD IN ('GW') AND (R.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} OR R.NX_VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId})
AND ((R.RHDL_MODE = 'R' AND I.CG_NO NOT IN (SELECT GR_NO FROM TMT_GR WHERE RHDL_MODE = 'R')) OR (R.RHDL_MODE = 'C')) GROUP BY I.VSL_CALL_ID, I.CG_NO, I.WH_LOC_ID, I.LOC_ID, I.WH_TP_CD )
SELECT DISTINCT W.VSL_CALL_ID AS VSLCALLID, P.VSL_NM AS VSLNM, W.LOC_ID AS LOCID, W.WH_TP_CD AS WHTPCD, W.WH_LOC_TP AS WHLOCTP, W.CG_NO AS CGNO, G.GR_NO AS GRNO, B.MF_DOC_ID AS MASTERBLNO, B.BL_NO AS BLNO, S.MF_DOC_ID AS BOOKINGNO, S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO AS SHIPGNOTENO, ISNULL((SELECT TOP(1) 'Y' FROM TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE NX_VSL_CALL_ID = W.VSL_CALL_ID AND (NX_REF_NO = B.BL_NO OR NX_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) ), 'N') RHDLYN,
ISNULL(I.WGT, 0) AS STOREDMT, ISNULL(I.MSRMT, 0) AS STOREDM3, ISNULL(I.PKGQTY, 0) AS STOREDQTY,
ISNULL(O.WGT, 0) AS ACTMT, ISNULL(O.MSRMT, 0) AS ACTM3, ISNULL(O.PKGQTY, 0) AS ACTQTY,
ISNULL((SELECT TOP(1) CG_WGT FROM TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = W.VSL_CALL_ID AND (ORG_REF_NO = B.BL_NO OR ORG_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) ), 0) RHDLMT, ISNULL((SELECT TOP(1) CG_VOL FROM TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = W.VSL_CALL_ID AND (ORG_REF_NO = B.BL_NO OR ORG_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) ), 0) RHDLM3, ISNULL((SELECT TOP(1) PKG_QTY FROM TMT_RHDL_CG WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = W.VSL_CALL_ID AND (ORG_REF_NO = B.BL_NO OR ORG_REF_NO = S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO) ), 0) RHDLQTY,
ISNULL(W.WGT, 0) AS BALMT, ISNULL(W.MSRMT, 0) AS BALM3, ISNULL(W.PKGQTY, 0) AS BALQTY, ISNULL(W.WGT, 0) AS WGT, ISNULL(W.MSRMT, 0) AS MSRMT, ISNULL(W.PKGQTY, 0) AS PKGQTY
FROM WH_BALANCE W LEFT OUTER JOIN IN_JOB_INFO I ON W.VSL_CALL_ID = I.VSL_CALL_ID AND W.CG_NO = I.CG_NO AND W.LOC_ID = I.LOC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN OUT_JOB_INFO O ON W.VSL_CALL_ID = O.VSL_CALL_ID AND W.CG_NO = O.CG_NO AND W.LOC_ID = O.LOC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RHDL_JOB_INFO R ON W.VSL_CALL_ID = R.VSL_CALL_ID AND W.CG_NO = R.CG_NO AND W.LOC_ID = R.LOC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_GR G ON W.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND W.CG_NO = G.GR_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_SHIPG_NOTE S ON S.VSL_CALL_ID = G.VSL_CALL_ID AND S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO = G.SHIPG_NOTE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_BL B ON W.VSL_CALL_ID = B.VSL_CALL_ID AND W.CG_NO = B.BL_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_VSL_SCH V ON W.VSL_CALL_ID = V.VSL_CALL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TMT_VSL_PART P ON V.VSL_CD = P.VSL_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CHANGE_VSL_INFO CHGVSL ON I.VSL_CALL_ID = CHGVSL.VSL_CALL_ID AND (CASE WHEN S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO IS NOT NULL THEN S.SHIPG_NOTE_NO ELSE B.BL_NO END) = CHGVSL.ORG_REF_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TMT_JOB( VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, JOB_NO, JOB_TP_CD, CG_NO, VSL_CALL_ID, JOB_GROUP, JOB_PURP_CD, JOB_CO_CD, SP_CA_CO_CD, RC_CO_CD, DELV_TP_CD, OPE_CLASS_CD, WORK_ST_DT, WORK_END_DT, SHFT_ID, SHFT_DT, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, PKG_QTY, TO_LOC_ID, STAT_CD, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, RMK ) VALUES ( (SELECT VSL_CD FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID= #{vslCallId}), (SELECT CALL_YEAR FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID= #{vslCallId}), (SELECT CALL_SEQ FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID= #{vslCallId}), #{mfDocId}, (SELECT 'J' + FORMAT(GETDATE(), 'yyMMdd') + RIGHT('000000000' + ISNULL(CONCAT(MAX(CAST(RIGHT(JOB_NO, 9) AS INT)) + 1, ''), '000000000'), 9) AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB), #{jobTpCd}, #{cgNo}, #{vslCallId}, #{jobGroup}, #{jobPurpCd}, #{jobCoCd}, #{spCaCoCd}, #{rcCoCd}, #{chgRcCoCd}, #{delvTpCd}, #{opeClassCd}, SYSDATETIME(), SYSDATETIME(), DBO.F_GET_SHIFT_CD(SYSDATETIME(),''), DBO.F_GET_SHFT_DATE(SYSDATETIME()), ABS(#{wgt}), ABS(#{msrmt}), ABS(#{pkgQty}), #{toLocId}, #{statCd}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion}, #{remarks} )

SELECT TOP(1) J.JOB_NO AS jobNo FROM TMT_JOB J WHERE J.VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND J.CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND J.JOB_GROUP = #{jobGroup}
INSERT INTO TMT_INV_LOC( VSL_CD, CALL_YEAR, CALL_SEQ, MF_DOC_ID, VSL_CALL_ID, LOC_ID, CG_NO, JOB_NO, WH_LOC_ID, SEQ, CG_WGT, CG_VOL, PKG_QTY, WH_TP_CD, UPDATE_TIME, STAFF_CD, VERSION, WH_LOC_TP ) VALUES ( (SELECT VSL_CD FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID= #{vslCallId}), (SELECT CALL_YEAR FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID= #{vslCallId}), (SELECT CALL_SEQ FROM TMT_VSL_SCH WHERE VSL_CALL_ID= #{vslCallId}), #{mfDocId}, #{vslCallId}, #{locId}, #{cgNo}, #{jobNo}, SUBSTRING(#{locId}, 1, CHARINDEX('-', #{locId})-1), (SELECT ISNULL(MAX(SEQ), 0)+1 FROM TMT_INV_LOC WHERE VSL_CALL_ID = #{vslCallId} AND LOC_ID = #{locId} AND CG_NO = #{cgNo} AND JOB_NO = #{jobNo}), #{wgt}, #{msrmt}, #{pkgQty}, #{jobCoCd}, SYSDATETIME(), #{userId}, #{newVersion}, #{whLocTp} )
